tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went to sushila matrutva clinic for the pregnancy checkup.Doctor hira is so good.All staff is so helping.

Doctor cleared all my doubts and explained everything very well.

My pregnancy journey went so smooth with her guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Hira Mardi, no one else can justify this name more than her.
She is truly gem of a person.She is just like an angel for all of us "to be a mother out there". An angel who showers her love sitting in "Sushila Mathrutva Clinic".
Initially, when my husband and I met her she welcomed us with a warm wish for our new journey that we entered.Soon when our routine checkups started with her, she always made us feel homelike on our visits to her clinic.
We never felt as if we are meeting a professional doctor, and we are her patients or clients.She always treated us like a family with that personal touch to make us feel comfortable.Not even this but her clinic staff is also very good.
We are lucky and fortunate to have her as our doctor throughout this journey.
Dr. Mardi is full of life and down to earth as a doctor she has all warmth for her patients.Fortunately my journey of being a mother with her was very comfortable and I did not even realize when my 9 months passed.
I wish her good health, wealth and success in her future endeavors.May she deliver many more babies ahead. As a happy n satisfied patient I highly recommend Dr.Hira Mardi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Recently, we are blessed with an adorable baby girl.. I'm really glad that we got in touch with Dr. Hira.Mardi from the 1st day of my pregnancy and have been consulting her since last 9 months. This was my1st pregnancy and it was high risk as I had medical complications but because of Dr. Hira Mardi's treatments, availability, caring nature, guidance, and 24/7 availability made my high risk pregnancy very smooth. We wanted normal delivery, and Dr. Hira Mardi did everything in her hands to support my decision. Due to low hemoglobin and other medical complications we had to induce labour 2 weeks early for the safety of our baby. I was in labour for almost 30 hours and Dr. was always there checking on me. I couldn't bare the labour pain n had to switch to c-section.. The operation went really smooth.. we had our baby girl delivered at Cloudnine.  

I highly recommend Dr. Hira Mardi for anyone who is looking for an amazing ObGyn for their pregnancy journey.

We Thank you Doctor from the bottom of our heart for always being there especially during this tough time of covid-19.  Thanks for advising us and explaining each and every minute details, reminding me the importance of having meds/exercise and keeping track of everything during regular checkups. Thank you for always being available and reminding us by texts and calls.
  
We will always be grateful to youüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Recently we blessed with an adorable baby girl...We are really fortunate to get in touch with Dr. Hira Mardi during our pregnancy. We have been consulting her since last one year and the experience was so nice that I would recommend her to everyone for any Gynec and obstetrics related issues. Her timely treatments, professional guidance, kind words, caring nature and availability made our voyage of pregnancy very smooth and exciting. Our baby girl was delivered(normal) with supervision of Dr Hira Mardi at Apollo Cradle. As I was there in the labour room during the delivery, I will treasure all those moments that I have witnessed for my entire life. Its hard to express the happiness having a new life in words. 

We Thank you Doctor from the core of our heart for always being there during the pregnancy and delivery of our share of happiness. Thanks for advising us and explaining each and every minute details and keeping track of everything during regular checkups. Moreover as this is our first child, thanks for educating us and being patient to answer all concerns and queries including the silly ones. Thank you for always being available and reminding us by texts and calls whenever I missed the dates.
  
We will always remain grateful to you for this new life of parenthood. We love you mam. Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Hira was very sincere in her treatment approach and explained the problem very well. She is a very good doctor and trusted medical practitioner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am going to provide my feedback for Dr.Hira Mardi based on my personal experience for my second delivery.I was pregnant with 4 months, when we moved from other part of Bangalore to Channasandra as this place is near to my husband office.My husband was searching for a **** doctor near  to us and he found one doctor is available right now in clinic Sushila Mathrutva. So, we decided to go and meet with Dr. Hira once. After our first meeting only, she made us speechless with her attitude and the way she took care of me.Dr. Hira listens all the complexation very carefully I was going through and answered all my questions with smiling. From the beginning she was planning for normal delivery for me even though I had C-section before 3 years back.She improved my health condition by suggesting good medicine and diets. I was feeling always nausea and doing too much vomiting during that period. But Dr. Hira suggested all the precautions.By time I was getting better and my health condition improved with her supervision. At the time when delivery date was near, she was regular taking care of me by checking my health condition. She asked me that I can contact her at any time (24/7) if there is any complexion. Even if she couldn‚Äôt pick the call may be due to her busy schedule but immediate next to that she called me back.At the last month we came to know that my baby is in breech position. Even though she gives us hope to wait for last week, in case baby position may change. But it didn‚Äôt happened for my case.Now when the date came for delivery, Dr. Hira provided option of some top hospital name where she visits. We choose Apollo Cradle. She did very well C-Section delivery.Finally, Alhumdulillah we blessed with baby girl. Masha Allah!!!.My experience with Dr. Hira Mardi was excellent and was good memory for us.I wish Dr. Hira to get more success and her career and her life and always be same how you have treated me. Thank you Dr. Hira!!.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Hira Mardi she is vary good doctor she will be friendly with patient great doctor . I will suggest to my friend and family to visit clinic. She is great full

tags: None
review: I visited Dr Hira Mardi on Wednesday 11th October. I told her my concern and trust me she is the least friendly doctor I have seen in my 27 years of life. She is least bothered about everything. My concern, my presence, my queries. She does not have a friendly approach at all. I asked her few questions in first visit and she is hardly explaining them. What is the point of taking so much money ** *** ***** **** ** ******** ******* ********* ***** when I met her for the follow up, she was on her phone the entire time and was not answering properly any question. How would a patient feel if the doctor is not paying attention? Why do people go to hospitals? To have clarity, right? This doctor only made me and my husband negative about the whole situation. *** **** *** **** ** *** ******* ** ** *** *** ******* *** **** ****** ******* ********* ** ** * **** **** **** *** * **** ********** ** ******* She is so unpleasant that my entire day got wasted  just by visiting her. Trust me, I did not have a good experience at all as a patient. I had to go to another doctor for the consultation ** ****** ********* *** ******* ****** ****** *** ** **** ****** ***** **** ****** ********* I just feel I wasted my money on her consultation *** *** ****** ********** * *** ** ** ******* *** ** ******.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We got to know about Dr.Hira Mardi from Practo. We have been visiting her clinic (Shushila Mathrutva Clinic) for my wife's pregnancy since Jun'20.Dr. Hira listen to our concerns, takes care of my wife very nicely. She didn't over-burden my wife with too much medications. Her clinic has a USG Facility, which was extremely helpful during Covid time, so we didn't have to roam around to other facilities or hospitals for USG. She is extremely nice person but at the same time very professional. Because of her, my wife went for Normal Delivery, and we are blessed with a healthy baby girl. She did all the procedures. Last but not the least, as being a very nice person, she has been doing a very good service. Her remuneration for consultations and for USG at her facilities are quite reasonable. Her assistants at the clinic were quite helpful.We are glad, we got in touch with Dr.Hira Mardi, as we would be forever thankful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had consulted with Dr. Hira for pregnancy, since start till post delivery and we are very much happy and satisfied the way she dealt our case. With proper diagnosis and tests carried out on time we could identify the complications before hand like hypothyroidism, diabetes, urinary tract infections and hence precautions/treatment was done. Doctor is very caring and friendly and explains everything with utmost patience. The clinic is well equipped and I got all the scans and tests done at the same place itself. The staff/sisters are also very responsible, caring and friendly which makes the overall experience excellent. We were blessed with our baby on June 1st, all thanks to Doctor Hira.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

I went to sushila matrutva clinic for the pregnancy checkup.Doctor hira is so good.All staff is so helping.

Doctor cleared all my doubts and explained everything very well.

My pregnancy journey went so smooth with her guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Totally satisfied with our interaction and consultations with Dr Hira. Right from initial pregnancy tests till final delivery and even beyond, Dr Hira was very supportive and used to take care. During pregnancy, BP was detected on the higher side. Dr. Hira used to personally follow up regularly to check the BP status. For delivery, she was very supportive and waited for long to try for normal delivery.

Would highly recommend her for pregnancy related consultations and for delivery. Also considering all scans can be done right at her clinic is an added advantage. Charges are also lesser than big hospitals - a bonus.

Thank you Dr. Hira for your effort and support throughout pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Hira is a very co-operative,  supportive and a friendly person.She is a very down to earth person  .Her timely advices were very instrumental during my preganancy.  She was always approachable whenever we reached out to her for any doubts. She is a very experienced gynecologist  which is evident by her timely advices given to me during my preganancy stages. I am lucky to have her as my medical consultant during my preganancy. 

Thank u Dr. Hira Mam for all the extended support.Wishing you all the best. 
Deepthi Nambiar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First I visited Hira mam for UTI.Her advice and explanation of the problem made us understand the problem severeness. Then I visited her again for my pregnancy confirmation.I consulted her throughout my pregnancy journey.She guided and supported me in every aspect.She patiently answered all my queries and silly doubts.She is very friendly in nature.Sometimes she scolds like my mom for not taking medicines properly on time. I was done with LSCS under her and delivered with an angel. and Iam completely satisfied with Hira mam and her treatment. I strongly recommend her to all of you.Thank you Mam for ur support and guidance throughout my pregnancy journey and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had consulted doctor Hira Mardi for my pregnancy. As it was my first pregnancy I had lots of doubts what to do and what not to.I used to ask every single question to the doctor and Hira mam used to answer all my doubts without hesitation even it‚Äôs a silly one. She used to explain in detail and creates friendly environment in each and every visit.
As instructed by doctor I used to walk and do exercises due to which I got the contractions naturally in 38th week. Doctor tried for normal delivery for about 15 hours but since the baby passed mecconium we don‚Äôt have time to wait for normal delivery. I had c section and delivered a healthy baby.
Overall I would say it‚Äôs a great experience with doctor Hira Mardi and I would highly recommend everyone to consult Hera mam to have a healthy and happy pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Scan,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
Me and my wife are actually from Mumbai so it was very difficult to for us here in bangalore to get a trustable doctor as we have no known people here. So by searching on google I found Dr. Hira Mardi's clinic very close by to my house. The moment we met the doctor we felt very comfortable and the doctor is very friendly, in simple words made our tension and stress go away and instilled confidence that I am there for you even in this covid19 pandemic situation.
My wife has a fibroid in her uterus, still the journey from first meting the doctor to the delivery of the baby went on very smoothly as doctor was available for us at just a phone call away. 
I was tensed as i dint have any relatives here, and due to pandemic was not able to call anyone here, how will I manage, but still due to doctors support and guidance all went well and I am blessed with a baby girl. 
With Dr Hira Mardis reference we got the delivery done at Cloud9 and the experience was very good and pleasant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Hira Mardi is very good n kindhearted,*** ********* ** ************actually after one baby,second time I was unable to get conceiv,due to some problems in my body condition,but after I went to Dr Hira,she gave me **** **** treatments,so now within 2months iam conceive(pregnant).she is like saviour God for me,friendly affication,even one of the sister in reception who is working with Dr,Hira,she is also very good,they are treating all patients very very well,I went to lot of hospitals n clinics,but Sushila Mathrutva Clinic is number one of all the clinics,üëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am  Reena.s  .  my age is 38.  I.consult  Hira  ma'am  for     my pergancy  in manipal  hospital vartur   .  I had great experience with  hira ma'am  .   I blessed  with  baby boy.  Oct 25.  I had c-section.  After  delivery    my B.p level was high  .       I was in   hospital  3days . Once the  B.p level  was  low     I was  decharged.   Now I had  a   healthy  baby  .  B.p level   also   normal .  Treatment  also very  good.   I had  great experience with   Dr Hira    .  I will  recommend  my friends and   relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Visited Dr. Hira Mam for my 2nd pregnancy checkup and later delivered a healthy baby boy under her. She is very friendly and patient to hear all my concerns and explaining everything clearly. She has taken utmost care and helped to go through my pregnancy journey very smoothly. **** ************ *** highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We went to Dr. Hira after conceiving as we were not getting satisfactory answers from our previous doctor. Dr. Hira treated me like a mother and answered all our questions with patience, gave us enough time during every visit and taken care of me nicely which made my pregnancy journey beautiful... She delivered my daughter and taken care of me during hospitalization after delivery as well.
We would like to recommed her to the expecting parents as we had very nice experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had been visited Dr Hira Mardi throughout my pregnancy.She is very experience doctor.She explain everything which is helpful.doctor is very friendly.Even through in my pregnancy I faced lots of health problems due to which I called her many time even in night also and she was responding to my every call and giving me suggestion.

Thankyou Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Is very friendly and listened to any issue calmly. Shushila Matrutwa clinic has ultrasound facility which is very good ( No need to go to other places then come for report check up ) . 

I will recommend Dr. Mardi for any OB/GYN PROBLEM  with 5 stars .
All the best to Sushila Matrutwa clinic  for future growth .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had been consulting Dr. Hira from the time i had conceived till post pregnancy check ups. She is very friendly and answers all queries with patience and good knowledge. My experience with her throughout my pregnancy has been great. Also her references for endocrinologist and lamaze were the best. Thanks to her treatment, care and support during labor that helped me for NVD smoothly..

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: The way doctor explains everything is quite helpful. She supported me very well throughout my pregnancy even when I was suggested for bed rest for 5 months. Because of her help my delivery was normal, which I didn't expect because of the bed rest. We are thankful to Dr. Hira‚ù§

Just trust her and follow her guidance. We are very satisfied with complete journey of 9 months post delivery too. Thanks to Dr. Hira.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** ******** *** she knows her stuff. She explained everything in detail, everytime we asked her, throughout the pregnancy period. We were completely happy with our experience and my wife who gets scared for small things was very comfortable with the doctor

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
First I would like to thank you to Dr. Hira mardi.she treated me very well during my pregnancy. At the time of delivery, she was awake for the whole night and tried for normal delivery. Due to some health issue she did c section and followed up me till my discharge. She is having so much patience and responded very well for all my questions after my delivery also. 
Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Hira has been a great help on the both professional  front (she being Gynac) and on mental front by giving the right treatment and consultation. Above all the most important thing, she was always available through call/messages in the challenging environment like COVID19. At time she herself used to enquire about my wife during her pregnancy. 
I would recommend Dr. Hira to all my friends and family.
I sincerely thank her, for her professionalism and service.

We were never worried about anything during our journey of pregnancy but we just enjoyed. Thank you so much ma'am..

review: I would strongly recommend Dr.Hira for gyenic and pregnancy related issues. Very satisfied by her treatment methods. Explains the issue and pros and cons of the treatment. She does not suggest unnecessary medications and tests therefore giving our body to heal on its own which I liked the most. The hospital staff Kavya and Shivani  are very friendly  and supportive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Choosing Dr Hira was the best decision and I would definitely recommend others to consult Dr Hira

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly. Patiently listens to problems and answers all queries. She closely monitored every symptoms during last two trimesters as it had possibility of developing in to high risk pregnancy. She took great care and was always available for any emergency or concerns. The staffs are also friendly and supportive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is very friendly and supportive. She had shared her personal number with me and was always available for any emergency or concerns I had during my pregnancy. I really appreciate when she even rememberd my next scan dates and asked for the reports to be sent via WhatsApp when she was out of town due to some personal emergency.
I had C section which went really smoothly in the safe hands of Dr Hira and within no time I delivered my bundle of joy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Wonderful experience visiting Ma'am. Right from the  beginning she is very down to earth.Being first time parents we have asked tons of questions and she has clarified very patiently all of them. Also, she has guided and helped my wife with normal delivery. I'm really grateful to her and the team for this wonderful experience. If you are also new parents and not sure which doctor to visit, I would recommend you try visiting Dr. Hira Mardi Ma'am and based on our personal experience, I'm certain you will not regret your decision.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr.Hira throughout my pregnancy and I really liked her knowledge and experience. *** ** * **** ******* ****** **** adequate human touch and very approachable.She isn't bookish and everything she suggested was very practical and easy to follow.In our generation where normal birth was just like folklore we hear from the previous generation,she had helped me with a Normal delivery and not C- section in Manipal,Whitefield. Even post delivery her medical advice and care has helped me recover in next 2days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We really want to thank Dr Hira Mardi for her support during the pregnancy period of my wife. We started her consultations from 4th month onwards, and the journey has been great. Her experience and advise has helped us in every decision making whether it is scan related, medicine related, hospital related or even if it is something which is very small. During my wife's hospitalization she ensured that everything is taken care off and seamless and hassle free. We strongly recommend her and thank her from the core of our heart. Her team in Sushila Matrutva clinic is also very helpful. We wish her and her team all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Actually we went for 19th week anomoly scan. We had to wait for 30 mins.Instead of Dr. Hira, a male doctor took scan. He was friendly. He showed only main parts of baby on scan like head, hand, leg, heartbeat and spine. But we expected that doctor would show more like facial parts and bone structures ( Our previous experience with different clinic and different doctor for NT scan was very fascinating.She showed lot of baby parts and bone structures. Pictures were also very clear unlike this). Final Report quality of the pictures also not that worthy of Rs. 2000.I hope they improve their infrastructure in future and little more baby scan show to (going to be)new parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To start with, won't share the reason for visiting her, but can assure you that she has a friendly attitude which eases you if you are already tense. She is experienced and knows what her patient needs at most and what's better for them. Even the staff is friendly and welcoming.. and the clinic is clean and we'll established. I will recommend her any day and will be looking for her appointment in future if need be. There was nearly 10-15mins waiting time for us which is amazing, as all other docs had made us wait atleast for an hour or more.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Hira Mardi is approachable and explains issues and recommendations clearly. Her treatment well suited me and I didn't had any major complications throughout my pregnancy journey. I am thankful to doctor for everything.

Would highly suggest her for gyn issues and pregnancy consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,

What should patient do if they have doubts regarding health issues post surgery. I have undergone surgeries before and doctors do provide their contact and attend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife undergone 2 major complaints (ambical hernia and abortion). When we approached Dr. HIRA in Narayana hospital in Whitefield and she suggested to go with another Surgical specialists for the treatment. She is very nice and explain the criticality and support from bottom of her heart. Both treatment has been successful and she is recovery completely.  Thanks to Dr. Hira for her support and help.

Regards, 
PRIYA Senthil
